name: ISUZU MOTORS Germany GmbH
goal: We are the development center of ISUZU MOTORS Limited to develop and calibrate ISUZU diesel engines for road and non road vehicles to comply with European emission regulations.We are performing tests on test benches, chassis dyno's and public road. We are also providing Aftersales services for ISUZU products in Europe
interests: Environment, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: European emission regulations, Stage V for non road machines, RDE tests, PEMS measurement
